summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a potential tour of Guana Island and hotel. The email emphasizes confidentiality and suggests that the communication may be privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing arrangements for a tour of Guana Island.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, responding positively to Epstein's previous message.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about personal arrangements, indicating a friendly relationship.

keyFacts: The email discusses organizing a tour of Guana Island and hotel.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Epstein emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the email.
